description: This is the back hallway, which isn't very long.  You walk into a
good size room, just not big enough for a room, but not small enough
for a hallway.  Three doors stand before you, to the north, east and
south.  The door to the north has a white glass window in it, and
black letters on the front read "Pilot's Lounge".  To the south
another door with white glass stands, it's black letters reading
"Meeting Room".  The door to the east is the Port Master's Office, the
main guy in charge of the hangar and port itself.
36524.name: Back Hallway

description: A small hallway goes south going to the bathroom and the master
bedroom.  To the east is the master bedroom of the house, and the side
entrance to the bathroom stands west.  A window south looks out into
the scap yard.
36532.name: Small Hallway

description: A large room that matches the others stands here, with the white on
white with black carpet.  A large white table and chair stands in the
center, clean and empty.  A large window to the south overlooks the
southern scrap yard of the hangar.  A few pictures hang off the walls,
and that is about it for this room.
36526.name: The Meeting Room

description: The south wing of the Westbridge Port Hangar.  To either side of
you are large arched doors leading into each of the private hangars.
The ceiling stands high above, and the stone floor below.  Back north
is the center part of the hangar.
36516.name: Westbridge Hangar: South Wing

description: A large path follows along the outter eastern wall of the Port
Westbridge Hangar.  To the east the scrapyard stretches out covering
the rest of the lot.
36542.name: Path Along the Northern Wall

description: You stand in the Pilot's Lounge of the Westbridge Port.  The room
matches the rest of the offices, the white ceiling and walls, and the
freaky black carpet.  You see couches and chairs in the room, a
bookcase filled with things to read, a small fireplace in one corner
and windows look out over the scrap yard, and northern Westbridge.  A
magical sphere sits in the corner, glowing white with energy, also
seen on airships.  An old punk wizard sits next to it smoking a pipe,
and casting a few spells.
36525.name: Pilot's Lounge

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36548.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
{*>>>>> {&From This Point EAST & ON is {RFREE PK {*<<<<<{x
36565.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The long wooden deck ends here before someone's front door.  A
large metal door stands to the east, a small gas light burning next to
it.  A mailbox is mounted under the light.  You see a window to the
south, and that is about it.  The scrap yard to the northeast.
36538.name: Before The Front Door

description: This is the main hangar of the Westbridge Port.  To either side of
you are massive brick walls.  To the west are the arched doors leading
out of the hangar, and up is elevated center area.
36502.name: The Westbridge Main Hangar [Ent]

description: The north wing of the Westbridge Port Hangar.  To either side of
you are large arched doors leading into each of the private hangars.
The ceiling stands high above, and the stone floor below.  Back north
is the center part of the hangar.
36507.name: Westbridge Hangar: North Wing

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36568.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36557.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The living is very large, and the main part of the house.  The
carpet is a deep wine red color, and stretches north into the dining
room and south to the master bedroom.  The room has a large sofa with
a coffee table in front of it.  Two chairs stand on either side of the
couch, making a small circle.  To the north the floor raises a little
and you can see a large dining room.  A small hallway with two doors
stands to the south, and the backdoor to the east.
36529.name: The Living Room

description: A large rock square has been built into the ground here, for the
landing and taking off of airships from this port.  This is Port
Westbridge, in the city of Westbridge.  A large brick hangar stands to
the east, a storage and repair facility.  The path to the hangar is
south and then east.
36573.name: Landing/Take Off Zone

description: A large path follows along the outter eastern wall of the Port
Westbridge Hangar.  To the east the scrapyard stretches out covering
the rest of the lot.  A metal staircase leads up here, to a wooden
platform.  The actual main area for the scrap yard area is east.
36540.name: Path Along the Eastern Wall

description: A large dining room stands here.  A long table stretches between
the rooms, big enough for a good group of people.  The windows
overlook the scrap yards of the port, and the Westbridge Skyline.  To
the west an open door leads into the kitchen, and another open door
leads to the living to the south.
36530.name: The Dining Room

description: A hallway opens up into a small hallway.  To the south a door leads
into the bathroom facility of the house.  To the west the door opens
up into an private office area.  An open door to the north leads into
the large kitchen, and the living room is east.
36534.name: Hallway

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36575.name: The Scrap Yard

description: A white marble bathroom stands before you, everything white marble.
The toilet stands to the southwest, with a sink directly south.  To
the east is a large claw foot bathtub, with a shower curtain around
it.  A bathroom mat stands in front of the tub, and a small closet
sits to the north.  A door just south of the tub leads to the hallway
near the master bedroom.
36536.name: The Bathroom

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36567.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36561.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36560.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36550.name: The Scrap Yard

description: Welcome to the Port Westbridge Scrap Yard, the best place to get
junk metal from for all your needs, armor, weapons, airships, anything
metal has been junked here.  This is the northern end of Port
Westbridge, the airship storage and construction facility in
Westbridge.  A large brick hangar stands to the south, which is the
airship section of the place.  A path through the junk leads off east,
into the scrap yard section.
36544.name: Westbridge Port Scrap Yard Entrn

description: The spiraling staircase leads up into a small room on the top of
the office.  A large door stands to the west, leading into a house.
The outside air flows around you, as the scrap yard of Port Westbridge
looms to the east.
36528.name: The Back Door of the House

description: This is the main hangar of Westbridge, used for the construction
and storage of airships locally for Westbridge.  A large brick
building surrounds you, the ceilings almost too tall, and stretching a
football field in length to the north and south.  On each side of the
wings two large arched doors lead into private hangar spaces.  The
north and south end of the hangar look the same.  A pair of regular
double doors to the east leads into the offices of this port.
{C<-----{&Exit {r-{C+{r- {&Offices{C----->{x
36503.name: The Westbridge Main Hangar

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
{*>>>>> {&From This Point EAST & ON is {RFREE PK {*<<<<<{x
36546.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36556.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The north wing of the Westbridge Port Hangar.  To either side of
you are large arched doors leading into each of the private hangars.
The ceiling stands high above, and the stone floor below.  Back north
is the center part of the hangar.
36505.name: Westbridge Hangar: North Wing

description: A large dark bedroom opens up.  Shaded windows look out over the
scrap to the north, east and south.  A large bed sits in the center of
the room, freshly made.  A variety of dressers and tables line the
walls, used by both members of the family.
36533.name: The Master Bedroom

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36563.name: The Scrap Yard

description: A large office very simular to the one in the office below opens
up.  The same wine red carpet takes up the floor in here, and the
walls are oak bookcases filled with all kinds of books.  The same desk
from below stands looking westwards, which the wall is large windows
looking out into hangar.
36537.name: Hathorne's Private Room

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36558.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36569.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36574.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The south wing of the Westbridge Port Hangar.  To either side of
you are large arched doors leading into each of the private hangars.
The ceiling stands high above, and the stone floor below.  Back north
is the center part of the hangar.
36515.name: Westbridge Hangar: South Wing

description: The white and black scheme of the offices ends when you enter this
office, and you find something more straight looking.  A large oak
desk stands to the east, facing the west.  A large picture window
looks out to the east over the scrap yard.  The walls are covered with
oak bookshelves, which are full of books.  A tilted table sits in one
corner with a map of the Great Realms on it, and charted out.  The
ceiling is oak panels, and the floor a red wine color.
36527.name: The Head Office of Port Westbridge

description: A large path follows along the outter eastern wall of the Port
Westbridge Hangar.  To the east the scrapyard stretches out covering
the rest of the lot.
36541.name: Path Along the Eastern Wall

description: A clearing opens up in the piles of twisted metal, and you see
basically a smell shed, with a wood stove outside, and freshly forged
metal parts all around.  This is the Westbridge Scrap Yard, the place
to sell and trade metallic items.  To the east is the scrap yard.
36545.name: The Westbridge Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36549.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36547.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36551.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The office here is somewhat large, and very white.  The ceiling is
white tiles, the walls are white plaster, and the carpet is black....
A large wooden desk expands the entire eastern side of the room,
blocking off the door to the east.  Chairs line the outter walls, used
for waiting and just plain sitting.  The walls have a few paintings of
airships, and some advertisment posters, like parts and other things.
The western wall are large windows, looking out into the hangar area.
36504.name: Westbridge Branch [Judge Inc]

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36552.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36571.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36576.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The south wing of the Westbridge Port Hangar.  To either side of
you are large arched doors leading into each of the private hangars.
The ceiling stands high above, and the stone floor below.  Back north
is the center part of the hangar.
36514.name: Westbridge Hangar: South Wing

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36554.name: The Scrap Yard

description: The north wing of the Westbridge Port Hangar.  To either side of
you are large arched doors leading into each of the private hangars.
The ceiling stands high above, and the stone floor below.  Back north
is the center part of the hangar.
36506.name: Westbridge Hangar: North Wing

description: You stand in front of 317 Coffin Street, Westbridge.  The once
great X-Cops Station House use to stand in this lot, until the guild
was closed down and destroyed.  The building is gone, but now stands a
large hangar type building, used for the construction and storage of
airships, owned by Judge Incorperated.  A large iron fence surrounds
the entire lot, which sticks into the bad neighborhood of Westbridge.
The gates in the fence are to the east.
36500.name: {RJ{ru{&d{rg{Re {YAi{yrsh{Yip {RRe{rpa{Rir {x& {CS{ctorage {g[{C317 {RC{ro{*ff{ri{Rn {GS{gt.{g]{x

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36572.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36562.name: The Scrap Yard

description: A large kitchen stretches out before you.  To the north a sink
stands, with a window looking out.  Countertops to either side of the
kitchen, and counterspace above.  The stove is to the east, along side
of the icebox, which is just north of the door leading to the dining
room.  The southern wall contains a doorway leading to the hallway
south, and the main door of the house is to the west.
36535.name: The Kitchen

description: A small round table stands in the middle of the breakfast room,
with four chairs.  Large windows look out in almost all directions
over the view of the city, and the scrap yard.  A warm cool breeze
blows in from an open window, and in the mornings you can see the sun
come up over Westbridge.
36531.name: The Breakfast Area

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36555.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36566.name: The Scrap Yard

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36553.name: The Scrap Yard

description: A large wooden platform follows the hangar outter wall to what
looks like a second floor on the rear offices.  The staircase leads
back down to the scrap yard area.
36539.name: Staircase

description: A large courtyard stands before you, filled with some scrap metal.
The large brick hangar stands to the east, very tall and plain.  Large
square glass windows cover the top of the walls, right before the
roof.  A pair of large arched doors stands to the east.
36501.name: The Westbridge Port Courtyard

description: A large path follows along the outter northern wall of the Port
Westbridge Hangar.  To the west the scrapyard stretches out covering
the rest of the lot.
36543.name: Path Along the Northern Wall

description: All around you is piles of scrap metal.  You can see swords and
armor plates, chain mail and some machinery as well.  The dirt paths
leading though the metal is endless.
36564.name: The Scrap Yard

36570.name: The Scrap Yard

36559.name: The Scrap Yard

36579.room_name: Doctor X stands here with a needle in his hand, grinning.
36579.name: Doctor X~
36579.t_flags: T It says hes a dealer~

description:
A large horse stands here, fitted with offical X-Cops uniform.
On the sides of the saddle, two lights hang off, ready to pull
over those who dis-obey the law. The horse looks fast, and mean.
{x
Remember, a horse IS a police officer too.

description:
Before you stands a large horse drawn carriage. The carriage
is black, and the windows on the side have bars over them.
The shield of the X-Cops hangs on each side. The horse pulling
the wagon you see is a Patrol Horse.

What stands before you is the most beautiful german shephard you
have ever seen, it is equipped with a bullet proof dogvest and a

the law your going to need a Technis injection, so becareful.  This
dog followers the orders of his great master, a law follower and
enforcer, the one the only {RX{D-{RC{rOP{RS{D!!!!  {x
